about.name: Mario Enrique Cuberos
about.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
about.description1: I'm an industrial engineer and Full Stack Software Developer with over 2 years of experience. Specializing in Angular, React, Laravel, and Node.js, my focus is on enhancing site functionality, design, and visualization.
about.description2: As a software analyst at Konecta, I drive development, database management, and implementation processes using a range of technologies like Angular, React, Laravel, and PHP. Committed to process improvement and leveraging my academic background for better business information flow.

work1.title: Simulacro SENA
work1.description: Created during the beginning of learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

work2.title: Orden de Cargue
work2.description: Development done exclusively for desktop, using JavaScript and PHP for sending and receiving loading orders from Sales Room to Arcillas del Rosario S.A.S. Production Plant.

work3.title: LandingPage de Simulacro
work3.description: The landing page is created separately due to limitations of free hostings (under construction).

work4.title: Rule Of Thumbs
work4.description: Rule of Thumbs is a website that allows collecting public figures' opinion votes. Developed with React and Firebase. (In Progress)

work5.title: Alfa App
work5.description: Application made to obtain feedback and evaluation of critical areas in Alfacer del Caribe S.A.S.

work6.title: Pet Finder Santa Marta
work6.description: Tinder-like application developed specifically for mobile devices to help potential pets find interested people in Santa Marta city.

about.name: Mario Enrique Cuberos
about.title: Desarrollador Full Stack Senior
about.description1: Soy un ingeniero industrial y desarrollador de software Full Stack con más de 2 años de experiencia. Especializado en Angular, React, Laravel y Node.js, mi enfoque se centra en mejorar la funcionalidad, el diseño y la visualización de sitios web.
about.description2: Como analista de software en Konecta, lidero el desarrollo, la gestión de bases de datos y los procesos de implementación utilizando una variedad de tecnologías como Angular, React, Laravel y PHP. Comprometido con la mejora de procesos y aprovechando mi formación académica para lograr un mejor flujo de información empresarial.
